segments.text: Did you sign up for the picnic party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . I love the picnic party . It ’ s really family fun time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This time you can bring your daughter with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right , she is so excited and simply can ’ t wait .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are times of games planned , should have a grand time .
segments.speaker: S1
